self = <module.adb_tool.ADBTool object at 0x00000136F02270E0>, cmd_args = 'root', check = True

    def run(self, cmd_args: str | List[str], check: bool = True) -> str:
        """
        核心執行函式
        Args:
            check: 若 True，當 returncode != 0 時拋出異常
        """
        base = self._get_base_cmd()
    
        # 處理參數
        if isinstance(cmd_args, str):
            full_cmd = base + shlex.split(cmd_args)
        else:
            full_cmd = base + cmd_args
    
        result = subprocess.run(
            full_cmd,
            capture_output=True,
            text=True,
            encoding='utf-8',
            errors='replace'
        )
    
        # 用check 參數
        if check and result.returncode != 0:
            error_msg = (
                f"ADB Command Failed!\n"
                f"Command: {full_cmd}\n"
                f"Return Code: {result.returncode}\n"
                f"Error (stderr): {result.stderr.strip()}"
            )
